solution_line_template: If {milk_for_initial_cookies} half-gallons of milk bake {initial_cookies} cookies, then one half-gallon of milk bakes {initial_cookies}/{milk_for_initial_cookies} = {cookies_per_half_gallon} cookies.

If one half-gallon of milk bakes {cookies_per_half_gallon} cookies. to bake {target_cookies} cookies, you'll need {target_cookies}/{cookies_per_half_gallon} = <<{target_cookies}/{cookies_per_half_gallon}={half_gallons_needed}>>{half_gallons_needed} half-gallons of milk
